column1: ID System: Net Charge-offs 1-4 Family Residential

column4: The number of institutions represented in that column of data.  This number is used primarily for peer group data.

column2: Net Charge-offs:Loans Secured By 1-4 Family Residential Properties
column4: Net amount of loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties (which are held in domestic offices) that have been charged-off and debited to the allowance for loan and lease losses established by the institution.

column2: Net Charge-offs:Loans Secured By 1-4 Family Senior Liens
column4: Net amount of loans secured by first liens on 1-4 family residential properties (which are held in domestic offices) that have been charged-off and debited to the allowance for loan and lease losses established by the institution.    Prior to 2004, this item is not available for  TFR Reporters    .

column2: Net Charge-offs:Loans Secured By 1-4 Family Junior Liens
column4: Net amount of loans secured by junior liens on 1-4 family residential properties (which are held in domestic offices) that have been charged-off and debited to the allowance for loan and lease losses established by the institution.   Prior to 2004, this item is not available for  TFR Reporters    .

column2: Net Charge-offs:Loans Home Equity Lines of Credit
column4: Net amount of open-end loans secured by 1-4 family residential properties and extended under lines of credit (which are held in domestic offices) that have been charged-off and debited to the allowance for loan and lease losses established by the institution.
